name: Staybridge Suites Davenport

reviews.text: I have stayed in several StayBridge Hotels through out the country and I must say I love these hotels but something that all the others don't have is Mrs. Myrna... she is a super sweet lady that makes you feel like you are truly at home. I would just love to put her in my pocket and take her back to Florida with me!! Thank you Mrs. Myrna for making me feel like I'm at home with family!!
reviews.title: I love Mrs.Myrna!!

reviews.text: The location of the Staybridge is conveniently located. Restaurants close by as well as shopping areas. The entire staff is friendly and courteous. The evening social they have was great. Mrs. Myrna was so WONDERFUL!!
reviews.title: amazing hotel

reviews.text: The Staybridge Suites is a great hotel off of Utica Ridge - a location that's very convenient to Davenport's nicer restaurants and shopping. The evening Happy Hour was lots of fun and Myrna was an especially gracious hostess. She went out of her way to make sure each guest had everything he or she needed!
reviews.title: A good experience in a great location

reviews.text: Nice hotel at fair price. Conveniently located next to several restaurants. Great for business travelers. The standard suite is larger than a typical hotel room. Evening Social is nice addition; hot food and free drinks. Myrna is outstanding!
reviews.title: Good value

reviews.text: We stayed 2 nights at your hotel and had a wonderful experience. It was clean and I loved the kitchenette in our room. The breakfast buffet was fabulous and Myrna was wonderful and so friendly and helpful. Actually all your employees there were very nice and helpful. They even allowed us to have a late check out on Sunday which was very much appreciated since our daughter couldn't fly out until evening. Thanks for a great stay--we have always loved Staybridge Suites and you again didn't disappoint us.
reviews.title: Great hotel

reviews.text: Chad at the front dest is extremely friendly and super helpful. He is very family friendly and always make our five year old son feel welcome.
reviews.title: Friendly comfortable Convenient

reviews.text: Myrna in the breakfast area is also very friendly with our son and makes the guests feel welcome and cares about the quality provided by her and the hotel
reviews.title: Very Nice Staybridge

reviews.text: Was in Rock Island for an overnight for business. Found this hotel after trying two others. This is the best Staybridge I've stayed in (although I've only stayed in two others).
reviews.title: Finally a decent place to call (temporary) home in Davenport

reviews.text: Being I only stayed one night, I didn't get to experience a lot of the hotel, but the room was clean, the bed was comfortable and there wasn't any noise (and my room was next to the elevator).
reviews.title: Nice place! Good location.

reviews.text: It has a excellent location near a lot of great restaurants and shopping plus quick access to the interstate.
reviews.title: Great Deal!

reviews.text: This hotel was clean, comfortable and located just a short distance from several eating establishments. The evening manager’s social was very inviting with “hot” food that you could consider a meal (not just chips and “healthy” snacks). And did I mention free beer and wine!!!. The rooms were equipped with a nice size refrigerator, microwave, convection oven and dishwasher. It also had excellent lighting, great water pressure for your morning shower, comfortable bed and good internet connection. The ladies who headed up the manager’s special and the breakfast were extremely polite and customer focused. My only complaints would be that only two of the five front desk receptionist (or people that were behind the counter) were customer friendly. As I would come and go they did not even acknowledge me as to say hello or goodbye. They had to have noticed me because it was -4 degrees and when the doors opened, you knew it…lol. The morning breakfast left a lot to be desired but if you like powdered eggs and corned beef hash you would have been in heaven. On my last day, my room was not serviced but that was okay because after all it was my last day and up to this point they did an excellent job in servicing my room.
reviews.title: Comfortable Accommodations and Great Location

reviews.text: I traveled to the Quad-cities for on business last week and wanted a safe, comfortable place to relax at the end of the day. Staybridge fit the bill perfectly. The rooms are thoughtfully laid out with basic kitchen essentials, work space, a sitting area, and good storage space. Breakfast and reception, library, and pool provide inviting common areas. Laundry and fitness areas are useful and well kept. Best of all, the room was one of the quietest I have experienced in any hotel, regardless of the cost - virtually no sound from other rooms, outside, or the hallway. All in all, a welcome oasis at the end of the day. Without question, this will be my choice next time I return to the area.
reviews.title: Business trip oasis

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This was our first experience with this line of motels and we were surprised beyond our expectations. The room was clean and modern. The layout was perfect for our needs. An ice bucket would have been nice as there was no ice made in the freezer. We carried the freezer's ice catcher to the front desk and they filled it with crushed ice. Biaggi's is just up the street as well as other restaurants while all kinds of shopping is all within a few blocks. Our room was quiet even though it was New Year's Eve. We plan to stay there again next year.
reviews.title: Best hotel for the money

reviews.text: Stayed here for two nights with my husband and 3 yr old son. We had the king bedroom suite which was great because our son slept on the sofa bed in the living area. There are tons of great restaurants around as well as a target, hy vee etc. the exercise room is modern and pool nice.
reviews.title: Nice stay, great location

reviews.text: I have 2 comments that can be handled easily. 1) housekeeping in room could be a bit better. When you sit on the bed, you are at eye level with the platform the tv sits on. What I saw was a hair rubber band and dust. If something was used to extend the duster like a swifter...this would have not been noticed. Also one of the dining chairs had crumbs on it...not mine!
reviews.title: Great Place to stay!

reviews.text: 1) Breakfast is 630-930 m-f and 730-1030 s-s
reviews.title: Myrna makes the stay worth while

reviews.text: 2) Social reception is tue-wed-thurs 530-730 Free beer and wine. We had hotwings and salad last night. I hear that they change it from night to night. The free booze was great, but what the night was Myrna. This lady rocks all to heck. We had an awesome time chatting with her. She made sure that the food was on the table and she later cleaned up our plates.
reviews.title: All in All ...Great Value

reviews.text: 3) Beds were fairly comfortable. The rooms were clean and well kept. The kitchen in our room was a real plus.
reviews.title: Enjoyable stay!!

reviews.text: 4) Only had 2 negatives for this place which were still not really that bad. We did not get recognized for our status with their rewards program. We were sent to the wrong and had to go back down and exchange keys for a new room.
reviews.title: Weekend stay for graduation

reviews.text: All and all this is hotel offers a very clean, comfortable, and spacious room at a reasonable price. The social reception and the free breakfast are a plus for the stay. I would stay here again w/o question.
reviews.title: Wonderful stay

description: Experience the difference in service when you come to the Quad Cities we know what you need. The Davenport Staybridge Suites is your best stay for a week, a month, or even a year. Extended-stay travelers play by different rules and need a hotel that understands your unique needs. The Staybridge Suites is designed from the ground up just for you. In the heart of the Quad Cities (Davenport, Bettendorf, Rock Island, and Moline) we offer a fast and convenient location to John Deere Headquarters, Alcoa, Rock Island Arsenal, Trinity Hospital at Terrace Park, Genesis Systems, Genesis Medical Center, Kone, Mid American Energy, Von Maur, and Palmer College only to name a few . The Staybridge Suites gives you the amenities that make you feel at home. All rooms are fully equipped suites, room to spread out, space to work and space to relax. Plus there s great shopping, dining, and entertainment within walking distance.
